title: Hotel Continental Forum Sibiu
description: Cazare rafinată într-o clădire din anii 1800, restaurată, cu un restaurant, un bar și o cafenea.
hotelDescription:
Situat într-o clădire din secolul al XIX-lea, restaurată, într-o zonă comercială verde, acest hotel elegant se află la 7 minute de mers pe jos de Muzeul Național Brukenthal și la 9 minute de mers de Turnul Sfatului din Sibiu.
 Camerele cu decor primitor oferă Wi-Fi gratuit, televizoare cu ecran plat, seifuri și minibaruri. Apartamentele au în plus camere de zi. Un apartament cu două dormitoare, situat la ultimul etaj, are o bucătărie și o cadă cu hidromasaj. Este disponibil room service non-stop.
 Micul dejun de tip bufet (contra cost) este servit într-un restaurant spațios care are o grădină. Există o cafenea relaxată și un bar, precum și o sală de fitness și o zonă de spa.

similarHotelsNearby.name: Hotel MyContinental
similarHotelsNearby.description: Un hotel de 3 stele, cu 20 USD mai ieftin

questionsAndAnswers.question:
(Translated by Google) I have a question, can I pay with holiday tickets?

(Original)
Am o intrebare ,  se poate plati cu biletele de vacanta ?

answers.answer:
(Translated by Google) Call reception

(Original)
Sunați la recepție

(Translated by Google) Meals and accommodation, but parking cannot be paid for with tickets!

(Original)
Masa si cazare, dar parcarea nu se poate achita cu tichete!

(Translated by Google) You can pay with holiday vouchers for accommodation, meals, parking, anything except alcoholic beverages.

(Original)
Se poate plăti cu tichete de vacanță cazarea, masa, parcarea, orice fără băuturi alcoolice.

(Translated by Google) Unfortunately, I don't know if such a thing is possible. The safest is to call the hotel directly. 

(Original)
Din pacate,nu stiu daca se poate asa ceva. Cel mai sigur este sa suni direct la hotel.

is it possible to pay with the EDENRED holiday card?

este posibila plata cu, card de vacanta EDENRED?

answers.answer:

(Original)
Da este posibil

(Translated by Google) The hotel is located in a good place at the beginning of the pedestrian street of Sibiu. The level of daily room cleaning is low. Average breakfast. The location of the hotel makes up for everything.
We booked a suite and had a large space but don't know what the standard rooms look like. The design of the hotel rooms is in an ancient style.

(Original)
המלון ממוקם במקום טוב בתחילת המדרחוב של סיביו. רמת ניקוי החדרים היומית הינה נמוכה. ארוחת בוקר בינונית. מיקום המלון מפצה על הכל.
אנחנו הזמנו סוויטה והיה לנו מרחב גדול אבל לא יודע איך נראים החדרים הסטנדרטיים. עיצוב חדרי המלון הינו בסגנון עתיק.

questionsAndAnswers.question:

answers.answer:

Da se poate intra și fără cazare dar nu știu cât costa intrarea.

(Original)
Puteti cauta la google nr telefon al hotelului si întreba direct la ei. Altfel nu stiu.

(Original)
Da se poate

(Original)

updatesFromCustomers.text: The hotel is located in the center of Sibiu, very fast check in / check out, large rooms, very helpful staff and the price is ok.  Parking spaces are available in front of the hotel (for a fee)

reviews.name: K S
reviews.text:
Dobry hotel.
Urozmaicone śniadania, bardzo smaczne.
Polecam.
reviews.textTranslated:
Hotel bun.
Mic dejun variat, foarte gustos.
Il recomand.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your recent visit to us and for your review. We are glad that you had a pleasant stay and the breakfast was to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you in the future.

Best regards,
Alexandra Cosma- Sales Executive

reviews.name: Orit Kaizerman
reviews.text: מלון גדול, חניה בתשלום צמודה. קרוב מאוד למדרחוב שנעים לטייל בו.
reviews.textTranslated: Hotel mare, parcare cu plata in apropiere. Foarte aproape de o stradă pietonală care este plăcută de mers.
reviews.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay in Sibiu and we are glad that the central location was a positive aspect of your visit.
We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to hearing from you again.

Best regards,
Alexandra Cosma- Sales Executive
